column4: ランバート＿ちょっとした驚き

これがマリオネーションギア
……だろ？
column5:
This is what Marionation Gear are...
right?

column4:
どんな作業もこなす万能メカ。
たいていのことは
簡単にやっちまう。
column5: They're multipurpose mecha that can be used for all kinds of work. They can do most tasks in a flash.
column11: Multi-purpose mechs that can be used for all kinds of work. They can complete most tasks with ease.

column4: さあ、わしらも病院へ行こう。
column5: Come on. We'll head to the hospital too.
column11: Come on, we'll head to the hospital too.

column4:
薬さえあれば、
みんなすぐに良くなるぞ。
column5: Once everyone gets their medicine, they'll be feeling better in no time.
column11: Once they have the medicine, everyone will be feeling better in no time.

column4:
あの子も、いつか
わかってくれるさ。
マリオネーションギアのことを。
column5: That girl's definitely going to understand it one day, too -- the truth about Marionation Gear.
column11: That girl will surely come to understand it one day too. The truth about Marionation Gear.
